'''Enemies of Note''' are powerful individuals the [[Traveler]] can fight. As opposed to some [[Elite Enemies]] who might have a name within the lore of the game, Enemies of Note have their own unique fighting style.

All of them are [[Weekly Bosses]] but must be encountered within [[Story Quests|Story]] or [[Archon Quests]] before they can be fought repeatedly in [[Trounce Domain]]s or certain Points of Interest.
